page.title: 20Peak Park Rangers
page.content: The{Peak District National Park {Ranger Service}consists mainly of volunteers but one ranger is employed full time at{Crowden}and one works part-time at{Glossop.}The rangers from the Glossop area patrol{Kinderscout. } The ranger's job is to help people who are lost or who want information. Also they make sure people keep the laws about access to the National Park. They ensure people keep their dogs on leads, do not start fires or drop litter. During the{grouse shooting}season the rangers patrol the area warning walkers to stay on the public paths. Information supplied by I.Poole,I.Collier,P.Carey,I.Harrop,M. Challinor,R.Kent,A.Johnson,M.Rochell,M Butler,D.Bowles,S.Campbell,D.Bailey,C. Beaver,S.Macklin,D.Eatwell,S.Smith of Hadfield School.
